name: clothes
lookDescription: There’s a pile of clothes that kinda stink, but what kind of CS major doesn't smell at least a little?
useDescription: You put on your musty clothes. Your mother would be ashamed.
blockerText: You can't leave yet, you're naked!

name: keys
lookDescription: These are the keys to your front door and car. You can't leave without these.
successText: You unlock the front door. You feel less safe.

name: food
lookDescription: Genuine fish flakes - made with real cheese!
successText: You toss some flakes into the tank. Your fish appears content

name: door
lookDescription: It's your front door. Your roommate kicked it in and broke the lock. Now you have to lock it from the inside. Love that for us.
useDescription: You open the door. You feel ready to face the world!
blockerText: You can't leave while the door is closed

name: fish
lookDescription: This is your pet fish, Bubbles. I know, very original name. They look sort of listless
talkText: You stop to converse with Bubbles. They appear unaffected, but you feel better.

name: flashlight
lookDescription: A very convenient and useful flashlight is in this very dark room.
useDescription: You flick the switch, dousing the room in light

name: machine
lookDescription: An ancient-looking machine with two circular tape readers

name: meat
lookDescription: It's a handful of suspicious-looking meat. How did this get here..?
successText: You toss the lump to the dog, and happily retreats.

name: ghost
lookDescription: He's dressed in a shabby leetcode t-shirt and scrawling O(n!) complexity pseudocode in the dirt.
talkText: Hi, my name's Brian and this is my life story. I can give you the scroll you just gotta get me my thumbdrive portfolio so I can get a job when I graduate.

name: scroll
lookDescription: It's a sheet of paper that looks like a scantron, but there are a bunch of holes where you'd normally mark your answers.
blockerText: The ghost stops you. "Hey, I just said I'd give the scroll to you if you got me my thumbdrive portfolio. What gives? It should be around here somewhere.."
successText: You feed the scroll into the machine, and it whirs to life. A rift in time and space tears open and sucks you through!

name: rock
lookDescription: This rock reminds you of a certain wrestler-turned-actor. There are scratch marks on the ground behind it as if it's recently been moved.
useDescription: You shove the rock, revealing a divot with a small THUMBDRIVE inside.

name: dog
lookDescription: There’s a very scary, hungry-looking dog blocking your way. You have a feeling you might be its first meal in days.
blockerText: You try to approach, but the dog seems pretty dangerous

name: thumbdrive
lookDescription: It's a 512gb thumb drive. You get a feeling that it would hold a whole lot of coding challenges
successText: You give the thumbdrive to Brian. He hoots and hollers, "Thank you, brave warrior. Now I can get a job at General Dynamics when I graduate and then I'll be able to buy as many gaming rigs as I want! That's literally all I care about. Nothing else. At all. Ever. Vidja."

name: desk
lookDescription: It's a dingy old school desk, but it'll have to do. You've got a midterm to take, and you have no other choice!
useDescription: You settle into the left-handed desk and lay your head down.

name: lock
lookDescription: It's the lock you bought when your roommate kicked the door open and broke the old one.
blockerText: You can't open the door if it's locked
successText: You unlock the door. The lock falls to the ground and shatters.
